name: Marie's Travel
description:
"The Traveller: Maries" is a highly interactive search and puzzle development game.
The beginning of the game starts when the protagonist Marie learns about his brother’s death. The death incident has changed the protagonist’s original lifestyle. From then on, a thrilling and exciting puzzle solving journey will be launched around Tina. Players will cooperate with the protagonist and use your wisdom. And inferences, help the protagonist continue to crack the brain-burning mystery, and take you to unlock a new experience of solving puzzle games!

Game features:



The game has a rich plot, with 20 chapters containing more than 100 scenes to provide puzzle solving, thousands of character dialogues, warm and cold, each chapter has its own story line, and the plot has its own characteristics and wonderful!





And we will travel around the world with Marie through the trend of the plot, and appreciate the customs and characteristics of various countries from each beautifully produced scene!





At the same time, you need to use your observation power to find dozens of hidden objects and plot clues corresponding to the chapters in each scene, so as to solve all kinds of mysteries!





You can also get gold coins through scene levels, use gold coins to buy a variety of unique architectural decorations, decorate your dream island, and show your personal style!
